name: Draze Adventure
description:
Game by: Nicky Emery, Josh Farnaby, Luke Henry, and Kameron Laight

In our game the main character has the ability to switch between to different world states throughout the game. One of these world states being the real world and the other being the dream world. Using this ability to switch between these worlds the player must solve puzzles of an ever increasing difficulty, defeat challenging opponents and bosses to escape this nightmare once and for all. In the demo you are about to play, the main character is trapped in a maze and must use the world state switch mechanic in order to escape by finding balloons that are hidden in both world states. The player must also dodge obstacles and run a away from a nightmare that lurks in the maze in both world states.
